data.title: Bennett School of Innovative Technology
data.meta_description: Stream sports and activities from Bennett School of Innovative Technology in Buffalo, NY, both live and on demand.  Watch Bennett online from home or on the go. Located in Buffalo, NY, the Bennett School of Innovative Technology is an educational institution that prides itself on fostering innovative thinking and technological skills among its students.
data.text: Located in Buffalo, NY, the Bennett School of Innovative Technology is an educational institution that prides itself on fostering innovative thinking and technological skills among its students. With a commitment to preparing students for the rapidly evolving world of technology, Bennett School offers a wide range of courses and programs designed to develop critical thinking, problem-solving, and communication skills. Bennett School's athletics programs are as impressive as its academic offerings. The school's state-of-the-art facilities cater to a variety of sports, providing students with the opportunity to excel in their chosen athletic pursuits. The school is a proud member of the state athletics association, which enables students to compete at a high level against other schools while fostering a sense of teamwork, discipline, and physical fitness. Bennett School's athletics programs not only promote healthy competition but also instill important values such as sportsmanship and perseverance in its students.
